_source.short_desc: A complete web-based solution to instantly accept event registrations & payments securely, build personalized event web pages, & more.
_source.long_desc: Streamline the event creation process, encourage attendance, & increase revenue all with Event Manager. Whether you manage conferences, chapter meetings, training events, & beyond, our complete event management solution gives you the flexibility & tools needed to run a successful event. Event Manager even seamlessly integrates with your website, preserving your identity & further simplifying registration. Request a demo today to see how we can tailor our intuitive software to fit your needs.
_source.target_audience: Event Manager by 123Signup has been serving Associations, Non- Profits, Chapters, Trade Organizations, and Alumni Organizations since 1999.

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most Affordable Event Management Software Report

related_products.short_desc: Organizers of events of all sizes use Eventbrite to power their live experience.
related_products.features: Eventbrite is a ticketing and event technology platform that helps businesses organize and sell tickets to events online  while helping people discover events that fuel their passions. From workshops to concerts to conferences to world-renowned film and music festivals, Eventbrite houses events of all shapes and sizes. Eventbrites powerful platform, which can be accessed online or via mobile apps, scales from basic registration and ticketing to a fully featured event management platform.

related_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.
related_products.features: GoTo Webinar is trusted by more customers than any other online webinar solution and powers millions of webinars each year. Whether you use webinars for marketing, training, or corporate communications, GoTo Webinar puts the fun back into webinars with reliable technology that's super simple to use. Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

related_products.short_desc: Airtable is the database that anyone can use with a beautiful spreadsheet interface.
related_products.features: Airtable is the relational database for the rest of us. With a spreadsheet-like interface that anyone can use, realtime collaboration, and rich features like file attachments and reporting, Airtable is the friendliest modern database.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based software with event app, event registration, event marketing, and event management for in-person/virtual/hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Whova is an all-in-one event management solution that consists of an award winning event app, efficient online registration, powerful event marketing, and time-saving event management tools. 
Whova has won the Event Technology Award for 5 years in a row and has powered over 30,000 in-person and virtual/hybrid events for all kinds of organizations in over 100 countries, including American Express, Microsoft, Hilton, Lego, IKEA, L'Oreal, American Marketing Association, Harvard University, and NASA

related_products.short_desc: A complete event marketing and management platform that handles the entire event lifecycle (in-person & virtual) from start to finish.
related_products.features: Cvent delivers an all-in-one event platform for any event, and every event. Our platform simplifies the management of each stage of the event lifecycle while giving you the data and insights you need to maximize your value. Whether in-person, virtual, or hybrid, you'll have a single platform with everything you need to find suppliers, engage attendees, maximize sponsor value, and capture important event data.

related_products.short_desc: A number of companies use Bitrix24 as free event management software, since it comes with all the necessary tools for the job.
related_products.features: A number of companies use Bitrix24 as free event management software, since it comes with all the necessary tools for the job. First, there is CRM and client management module that lets you create quotes and invoices, send emails and manage vendors. Second there are shared calendars that let you schedule and book multiple venues. Third, there?s a project management module and task templates that organizers use to manage ground crews.

related_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage your event business: proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
related_products.features:
HoneyBook makes it easy for event managers to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid-all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

related_products.short_desc: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues.
related_products.features: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues that will increase sales and streamline the booking process. It is the first web-based system created by hospitality event managers for hospitality event managers. Since 2008 Tripleseat has taken the restaurant business by storm providing solutions and simplifying the event process from start to finish. Over 2,500 venues and 18,000+ event industry expert trust Tripleseat.

related_products.short_desc: Create a beautiful event website in minutes. Trusted by more than 300,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike and MIT.
related_products.features:
Create a beautiful event website in minutes. 

Build an event website, collect registrations, sell tickets, send invites, track attendees, and promote your event online. Reliable and secure. 

Trusted by more than 500,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike, MIT and Refinery29.

related_products.short_desc: The eSPACE Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market!
related_products.features:
eSPACE has best-in-class customer service and ongoing development support, Our Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market! Some of our key features includes:

- Work Orders and Assignments & Inventory Control
- Robust Reporting Options & Equipment Tracking
- Preventive Maintenance
- Vendor Portal

Take us on a free test drive for 30 days or request a free demo today!

related_products.short_desc: Event management software for fundraising including silent auctions, live auctions, online bidding, mobile bidding & more!
related_products.features: Simple, Affordable, Powerful software for in person, hybrid or virtual events.  Supports live auctions, paper or online/mobile silent auction bidding, custom ticketing, seating management, custom color branding, donation bundling with multiple high resolution photos, guest self-checkout, monetary donations, marketing communications, detailed reporting, sponsor recognition and more. Our best in class customer service is FREE via phone or email. We're here to help!

similar_products.short_desc: Hearty technology, lightweight package. We combine serious event management software with a platform designed for regular humans.
similar_products.features: Swoogo is the #1 event management software that empowers event organizers to run effective in-person, virtual, and hybrid events. We provide a platform that creates a satisfying experience for you to build ROI positive events on repeat for your attendees. Our platform includes UNLIMITED events & registrations , personalized registration flows, built-in attendee analytics, seamless CRM and payment integrations, website+email marketing tools with automation, & best-in-class customer support.

similar_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.
similar_products.features: GoTo Webinar is trusted by more customers than any other online webinar solution and powers millions of webinars each year. Whether you use webinars for marketing, training, or corporate communications, GoTo Webinar puts the fun back into webinars with reliable technology that's super simple to use. Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Webex Events (formerly Socio) powers flexible, end-to-end virtual, in-person and hybrid event experiences.
similar_products.features: Webex Events (formerly Socio) is the end-to-end event management & experience platform powering immersive, intuitive, and inclusive virtual, hybrid, and in-person events. With features like registration, ticketing, schedules, live streaming, & simulive; attendee engagement tools like games, polls, chat, & sponsorship showcase; and in-person products like onsite check-in & badge printing, lead retrieval & live display.

similar_products.short_desc: A complete event marketing and management platform that handles the entire event lifecycle (in-person & virtual) from start to finish.
similar_products.features: Cvent delivers an all-in-one event platform for any event, and every event. Our platform simplifies the management of each stage of the event lifecycle while giving you the data and insights you need to maximize your value. Whether in-person, virtual, or hybrid, you'll have a single platform with everything you need to find suppliers, engage attendees, maximize sponsor value, and capture important event data.

similar_products.short_desc: From budget planning to event registration and coordinating with vendors, monday marketer can handle your entire event operation.
similar_products.features: From budget planning to event registration and coordinating with vendors, monday marketer can handle your entire event operation. Monitor event registration, encourage cross team collaboration, track performance and attendance with customizable dashboards and more.  Assign jobs to different colleagues so everyone knows exactly what to do in what priority. From pre-event registration to post-event feedback, organizations can monitor conferences, company events, webinars and more in real-time.

similar_products.short_desc: Event management suite with registration, ratings, mobile app, payments, speaker mgmt, space layout, and more. Live & virtual events.
similar_products.features: AWARD-WINNING PLATFORM. Flat, predictable pricing. All features all of the time. Unlimited events including VIRTUAL events. Unlimited users. No credit card fees. Modern and easy to use for event hosts and attendees. Website creation, customized registration, free web-based mobile app, session ratings, speaker ratings, payment processing, speaker/agenda management, space layout, CEU's, etc.   Flexible configuration options serve virtually any event business model.  Rated tops by Capterra!

similar_products.short_desc: Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management team
similar_products.features:
Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management teams worldwide. Founded in 1996, eShow has helped Event Managers run thousands of events worldwide with tasks including registration, mobile apps, event websites, RFID, badge printing, abstract collection and so much more! 

When you choose the eShow product(s) that fit your needs, you tap into a powerful engine that no single-function supplier can hope to match.

similar_products.short_desc: The only event platform specifically designed to decrease stress and save you time. Plus 24/7 human support is included!
similar_products.features: The only event platform specifically designed to decrease stress and save you time. Drive engagement and measurable ROI while organizing everything within one platform. Our premise is that technology should make your life easier so that you can focus on creating unique experiences.

similar_products.short_desc: Build every in-person, virtual, and hybrid event with Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform - The Event Experience OS.
similar_products.features: Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform powers immersive in-person, virtual, and hybrid experiences for the world's leading brands. The Bizzabo Event Experience OS is a data-rich open platform that empowers Event Experience Leaders to manage events, engage audiences, activate communities, and deliver powerful business outcomes.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage your portfolio of meetings and events with ease, whether online, hybrid, or in-person; paid or free; private or public.
similar_products.features:
Attendease is an award-winning event management software used by mid-market/ enterprise organizations to manage a portfolio of meetings and events from end-to-end, whether online, hybrid, or in-person; paid or free; private or public.

Used by names such as Adobe, NBC, and Autodesk, our versatile software simplifies the complexity of managing events with a powerful suite of tools that ensures all details are addressed, changes are simple, and repetitive tasks are automated.

similar_products.short_desc: Sell tickets online and host your most successful event ever with TicketSpice.
similar_products.features:
Host your most successful event ever with TicketSpice. 

TicketSpice is easy to use, highly customizable, and unbelievably affordable. At just $0.99 per ticket, you'll save thousands, while offering a seamlessly simple ticketing experience. 

TicketSpice is flexible and feature rich, offering full branding control, timed ticketing, reserved seating, mobile scanning, box office, merchandise options, and more. 

If you're frustrated by expensive and restrictive ticketing systems that put their log

similar_products.short_desc: SpotMe is an event engagement solution tailored for companies looking to host high-touch events.
similar_products.features: SpotMe is an event engagement solution tailored for companies looking to host high-touch events. All event management, video production and app building tools are included, directly from your browser. The solution is suitable for simple webinars to sophisticated events with high production values. Forrester and G2 say SpotMe is a leader due to high engagement capabilities and deep customization and flexibility.

similar_products.short_desc: A comprehensive event management software that empowers organizers to plan, promote, and run online and in-person events.
similar_products.features: Zoho Backstage is all-in-one event management software to plan and run in-person, virtual, and hybrid event experiences from beginning to end with greater efficiency and impact. Right from designing an event website, selling tickets, and marketing an event, to communicating with attendees, presenting sessions, and analyzing an event's performance, Zoho Backstage has everything you need to grow your event and accelerate its success.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Catering software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Catering tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Catering software manages business functions for the catering, event planning, and banquet management industries. Catering software provides an integrated solution for coordinating essential business processes including client details, locations, scheduling, inventory management, menu planning, waitstaff coordination, and payroll, as well as marketing and budgeting functions. Catering tools can include document management functionality to help track proposals, deposits, contracts, and client histories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Conference software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Conference tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Conference software automates promotion, registration, and organization of live or online conferences.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Check In software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Check In tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Check In software helps significantly speed up the check in process at conferences, performances, and other events. This type of software can be deployed on mobile devices, such as smartphones and tablets, as well as kiosks, and often provides badge printing capabilities. Many organizations use Event Check In software to capture attendee information for lead generating purposes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Streaming software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Streaming tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Streaming software allows organizations to broadcast live event feeds over the internet and engage with their target audience.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Meeting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Meeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Meeting software enables teams to coordinate, schedule, conduct, and participate in collaborative meetings.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Event Apps software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Event Apps tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Event Apps enable event organizers to consistently distribute important event information to the attendees in real time and facilitate networking among attendees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Registration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Registration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Registration software automates the process of registering for conferences, meetings, classes, and other events. These applications offer a customizable solution for attendance tracking and event or meeting registration tasks. They also provide tools for processing payments either in advance or onsite, as well as donation collection and volunteer coordination features. Registration solutions also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery, and fee payment. Registration software is related to Event Management software and Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Ticketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Ticketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Ticketing software manages and automates online, kiosk, and box office ticketing for special events, theaters, parks, festivals, fairs, travel, and other activities. These applications help manage seat selections, event management, exhibitor data, performer assignments and locations, as well as online and onsite payment processing. Ticketing solutions also often integrate other business processes such as inventory control, transaction control, fulfillment history and sales tracking. Ticketing software is related to Event software, Registration software and Kiosk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Venue Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Venue Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Venue Management solutions aim to help event planners with marketing and scheduling of their facilities, ensuring that appropriate services and resources are provided for each event, and that the facility's capacity is optimally utilized.
